Class AddressList.DeliveryButton

java.lang.Object
  |

                          |
                          +--grendel.composition.AddressList.DeliveryButton
public class AddressList.DeliveryButton
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener

DeliveryButton displays "To:", "Cc:", etc and has a popup menu to change values.

See Also:
